actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the definition of low-income families for purposes of the United States Housing Act of 1937.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937, for purposes of determining low-income housing assistance eligibility based upon median income or income ceilings, to consider Los Alamos County, New Mexico, as: (1) an area separate from the Santa Fe metropolitan statistical area; (2) part of such area with respect to such determinations for those parts of the Santa Fe metropolitan area that does not include Los Alamos County; and (3) a difficult development area for purposes of the low-income housing credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of low-income families for purposes of the United States Housing Act of 1937.
